text:
She moves gracefully, her costume's fins swirling around,
dancing beautifully.

That was great! It was perfect just now!
I'll check it, so wait a moment.

............
Can you please refrain from watching so indiscreetly?

Oh, ...sorry, I was just mesmerized.
You looked like a mermaid.

Haha... It really was a great performance, making the most
of the stage and costume. It was a wonderful expression.
